description: This table contains build information for each device on each day as well as the product program id of each device or org on that day.

schema.name: org_id
schema.description: The internal ID of the Samsara product

schema.name: device_id
schema.description: The ID of the customer device that the data belongs to.

schema.name: latest_gateway_id
schema.description: The ID of the attached Vehicle Gateway (VG) from the latest device event. This is equal to 'device_id' when the device is a VG.

schema.name: active_gateways_on_day
schema.description: The number of active Vehicle Gateways (VG) attached to the device on date.

schema.name: latest_build_on_day
schema.description: The latest build version of the device on date.

schema.name: active_builds_on_day
schema.description: The number of successful device builds on date.

schema.name: boot_counts_on_day
schema.description: The total number of device reboots on date.

schema.name: product_program_id
schema.description: The is the program id assigned to the gateway or the org for firmware rollouts. Read this RFC for more details: [RFC](https://paper.dropbox.com/doc/Release-by-Program-RFC-NzlWyPen2Z1PRh9gMROcc)

schema.name: product_program_id_type
schema.description: The values indicate if the assigned product program id is at the org level or gateway level or any other level.
